ygData.msgSnippet: I know I said this a while back, but Jume it, I mean it this time round. Sorry for those who sent the info in the first time I asked it (one person). I ve got

Subject: NBW RPGers Website

I know I said this a while back, but Jume it, I mean it this time 'round.  
Sorry for those who sent the info in the first time I asked it (one person).  
I've got the website half made, the other half is basically all the info.  In 
case those of us that weren't here when it was first announced or just 
ignored it or forgot, here's the scoop.

We talked about making a website with pictures of all the NBW's participants 
with personal info, such as the stuff below for fun in honor of like a month 
of the eGroups Dyanasty of the NBW, or the first 10K hits, can't remember.  
Point is, below are the questions, please respond with your answers to those 
questions in that EXACT order.  I may not catch it if you accidentally place 
something in the wrong place.  Depending on the amount of people who reply, 
the website will be completed.  At the max it will take less than a week if 
everyone who's interested replies promptly since school will be over for me 
tomorrow at exactly 12PM Pacific time for two months.  So I'll have lots of 
free time.  So hurry up and answer these questions below!  Send them to ME, 
at KSLawDogg@...


Your Alias (IE: Soundwave)
Your Real Name (IE: Michael Meyers)
Your Age
Your Birthdate (IE: 1/11/11)
Your Hobbies (if any)
Your Favorite Food(s):
Your Favorite Song(s): (IE: "Final Countdown", "Jump", etc)
Your Favorite Artist(s): (IE: Europe, Van Halen, Bon Jovi, etc)
Your Favorite Album(s) and who did them (IE: "Bon Jovi" by Bon Jovi, "Final 
Coutndown" by Europe, "Van Halen II" by Van Halen)
Your Favorite TV Show(s) (IE: The Crocodile Hunter, South Park, Oprah, etc)
Your Favorite Book(s): (IE: "PMS: WTF?")
Your Favorite Author(s): (IE: Bob Mayer, Robert Doherty, Greg Donnegan, ETC)
Your Dream Job(s): (IE: Dictator of Earth, King of Earth, Emperor of Earth, 
etc)
Your Favorite Websites (Places on the 'Net you like to go to)
Your Favorite G1, BW, and BM Characters (in that order)
What Would You Buy With Five Million Dollars? (IE: The assassination of Bob 
Skir)

And any other things you'd like added.  Not only info, but pictures, whether 
they're of your alias or yourself and other stuff.  All questions are YOUR 
choice.  You don't want to tell your favorite song that's fine!  It's a very 
personal subject with some people.
